channel.title: Does anyone remember GraveScape 508?
channel.description:
Ohhh man. I used to love this server. It was just perfect man. I want people to post about their favorite memory about it if you've play. If you haven't played it, google it and look at some of the stuff it had. Otherwise, post what you loved or didn't like about the server, or spectate what others say.
Only reason I'm posting about a server, is cause it was just amazing. Its worth talking about, and its my first topic in this board, so I want to make this something interesting.
I really loved the magic and summoning, how your pet gets raised as your summoning level increases when the pet is fighting.
I really HATED that the server went down.
